physical_appearance:This is a pair of doorway hangings. It is \u0027L\u0027-shaped
 with small fabric hooks along the border. Each hanging consist of several panels
 with stylised figures of flowers
 animals
 and human beings. There are sewn-on inscriptions at the bottom of each hanging.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings. It is 'L'-shaped, with small fabric hooks along the border. Each hanging consist of several panels, with stylised figures of flowers, animals, and human beings. There are sewn-on inscriptions at the bottom of each hanging.
